Story #5 Part-2

  • March 17, 2021
  • Zizi

Most of my life I felt like an alien in a human society. Being 8 I remembered living in a different place. My family and I were tall big shiny creatures. We communicated telepathically. The connection between us and the whole place felt so warm, light and happy. I felt loved, accepted, open and relaxed. I called the place I remembered Green planet. I don’t know why a planet. That place felt so far away, and I missed it a lot. Human life, in the place I was in, felt like hell. This arose questions in me : “Why am I here? Why is everything so bad? What did I do, so I deserved this horrible everything? Why do I feel and understand the world differently?

I was a very sensitive being. When I was 9 or 10 I saw a spirit in a shape of a big white dog in my room. I asked who he was, and he said he is my protector. Before that it I remember myself being a small girl spending days, sitting under the table alone in the flat. I sat under the table because I was scared of what I saw and felt around. I felt the movement of the creatures, who live with us on a bit different level. I did not understand what this was. If I tried to share this with my mother to get some explanation, she never answered or believed. She never wanted to figure anything out or understand. Actually she kind of hated this part of me. She did not want to hear such things, she did not want to see this part of me. She always wanted me to be normal, to be the same as others. She tried to get this off me, saying this is bullshit, this is not real, this does not exist. But I could not agree, because I saw and felt it, and I trusted myself. Sometimes I felt like I’m crazy. There was no-one around, who can understand such things or feel the same way. I was totally alone, trying to figure something out.

At the age of 18 I met a psychiatrist at a party in a club. He told me about Carlos Castaneda books. He lent me a book the next day. And that was exactly what I was looking for. I always felt a deep connection with American Indians. I found someone who can see and feel the same way. Don Huan was my teacher at that time. I felt such a relief. I am not crazy, the level I see does exist. I bought all his books and read it all the time. A book was with me everywhere. I read a lot on lecture classes. I practiced everything what Don Huan tough Carlos. I used no drugs. I was working hard at every step in the normal state of the mind and everything worked for me. I saw all types of creatures who live near people. That time was the scariest time in my life. I was open for this type of communication, and they saw it. In a city I was like a firework, so the creatures kept coming in my room. At nighttime, I say black shadow figures standing in the room. The room was crowded, and I could not get read of them. I could not sleep. That psychiatrist, who showed me this teaching, became my friend, and quite often came to stay for a night to help me to sleep and rest. At those times I also had strong pain in the middle of my belly. I saw the world shining and being like a huge web, where everything is connected. People were yellow-white shining and warm vessels. Creatures, I was exploring, were blue and cold. It became clear just that they don’t really have a certain shape, they turn into any shape our mind can see and understand.

I also learned that they eat our energy. The creatures I met were eating low vibration emotions like anger, sadness, suffering, excitement. I saw gambling houses full of those, as well as monuments under which many people, who were killed in the war, were buried. I saw small creatures and medium size ones. Small ones live in corners by the ceiling in a tribe. They attack all together. By attack, I mean their connection to you and sucking your energy. Medium ones are mostly on their own. They can come in groups, but they work each for itself also sucking from so-called “bad” emotions. Both of those types can not be considered as bad, because it is the way they are and the way they survive.

I was brave enough to face them, so I did not turn into their energy food. Reading Castaneda’s books I realized I want to catch a creature. To catch a creature means literary somehow catch it, and it will serve you the way you want. I learned 3 state in our sleep process. First you are sleepy but kind of still awake, then you go into the state between awake and asleep, and the asleep state. As well, I started a practice of lucid dreaming.

At the same time I got brave enough to tell my mother that I don’t want to study languages and I want to go to psychological faculty. She did not agree. And power was in her hands, because I was totally financially dependent. So she decided I stay in the translation faculty and study psychology in the evening. And the main thing: I must graduate from psychological faculty with an excellent red musters degree. I agreed.

So all those practices with creatures were going with the whole day of studying two totally different things and dancing in a club every second week. “How could you do this?” you might ask. Well. That personal practice was my real life. The time when I am who I really am. So it was a priority.

I had a problem with my lucid dreaming practice. In the book the task was to find your hands and look at them. They will be the only moving and kind of living thing. I could not do it. But I again was very fortunate. I had a discipline in my university called “the changed states of mind” where a nice teacher told us lots about psychedelics, drugs, holotropic breathing, Castaneda’s practices and lucid dreams. Right after the first lecture I came to him and told the problem with the task. He recommended finding a book and reading it. The same night I tried and nailed it! I could not read it. The letters started to move and fade. So I understood this is a dream. Later practice also let me to find hands, create my own scenes and different stuff. Once I even was practicing my speech on the stage which I had to give in a speech competition. So I was working hard during the day as well as in dreams at night.

I tried astral travelling as well. But the realization that I will try to live the body and never come back was so strong that I left this practice immediately.

So let’s get back to the creatures.

I made my mind to catch one. I learned how to get in this between awake and asleep state pretty fast. In this state I could see the creatures and interact. This state was very scary. In this state you always find yourself in the room the physical body is. Quite often the room was dark, and I could not switch on the light. So a goal number one was to take this under control. I did not know how to catch the creature, but I should be able to get out of this state, when I need. So my psychiatrist friend helped me. He came to my place and I made 20 minutes jumps in that state of sleep. He woke me up every 20 minutes observing my body. My goal was to let him know from there that I need him to wake me up. I tried to move the body and shout, he could not see it. After a couple of tries I tried to use my breathing. And bingo he can see my deep slow breathing. Then for a couple of weeks or more I was observing this state and my dreams to see if there’s someone, who comes repeatedly. Finally, I noticed one, who liked me. You might ask “liked?”. Yep. He came in the room, and it was always with a good light. He was in a shape of a man. He hugged me, kissed me, and set with me on the bed. He came in a shape of a man, but the person looked differently every time. The main thing was his hugging and touching softly and carefully. After a few meetings, I realized this is the same being. I decided to catch him. And all my tries with waking me up was useless. The creature came randomly without any system. So I was just ready to catch it, when he will visit me again. I had no idea what exactly I was going to do. The first chance came. We were sitting on my bed as usual, and when he came closer I hugged him and tried to hold. He was scared and disappeared immediately. Next time I tried to hold his hands and he ran away again. Third time I was again in a room full of light. It was nighttime. I opened the window to have a cigarette and saw him hanging across the window really close. I grabbed him by the arms, and he screamed and disappeared. He was mine. We were linked. Next night I called him in my normal state, and he came. You might ask: “how did I know that he came?”. When a creature of this size come close to a sensitive person the great fear arises. You can not say why or what you are scared of, but the desire to run away to the end of this world is huge. I observed my sensations and feelings to him and despite that huge fear I felt like I got a dog, who understands me. I felt warmth and connection with him. We went along with an image of an enormous dog. I want to pay your attention again to the point, that in reality those creatures do not have any shape, they just cold, blue substances.

I learned that my guy eats negative emotions, and if I ask him to do something I provide the food. What can you ask from such a thing? Well, first thing I asked to protect my home from others. So not a creature except him can enter it. He did a good job. He stayed near the room at night and I started to sleep well. Providing him with my fear before going to bed. Then I called him siting at the lecture. I asked him to scare the teacher. The teacher’s voice became thin and scratchy followed by a cough. The cough was getting stronger as the creature was coming closer to her. Finally, she left the classroom. The lecture was over. I was amazed. I understood that was not right, but the interest won. Sometimes I called him, when I walked home late to accompany me. Ones I was followed by a man. I noticed it fast and called my pet. I saw a huge cape showed up behind my back, the following man immediately turn to another way. Another night a company followed me, and they were thinking to get to me. As soon as the pet showed up the group disappeared. I loved walking, so I spent many nights walking alone from the downtown to the not safe area, where I lived. My friends were always asking: “aren’t you scared to walk that way alone this late?” I was not scared anymore. The creature was by my side. I took 2-hour walks at any time in any condition, and I was always safe.

Ones I was hanging out with a biker’s club. My friend Tanya told me their problem with the man she loved. She said that a couple of weeks ago they were at a party, and a girl saw them. She wanted to get Tanya’s boyfriend and says she’ll get him! Very soon after that, they were not able to sleep together. When he came close to Tanya, he was getting so hot that he could not stay near, so he started slipping on the flow. Tanya felt there’s something wrong and strange with this. Same night I called my guy. I asked him to find who harms my friend and stop it. I went to bed and in the middle of the night I woke up, sat and started seeing with my eyes what he sees. I saw a dark room with a candle. The old lady, a witch, who did dark magic for others was sitting in the corner of her bed. She saw him. She was scared shitless. She started screaming, begging not to touch her. She promised to stop this bad deal and stop such activity at all. The pet came closer. And the vision finished. I did not see anything else. So I don’t really know how this ended for the lady. He showed what was needed to understand that the task was fulfilled.
